name: DIY Grilled Corn Bar
description: Elevate grilled corn on the cob your way.

ingredients.name: Everything Bagel Whole Food Topper, Better Than Bacon Topper, Chili Flakes & Garlic Topper, and Red Garlic Topper Blend

preparation: Place corn directly over the heat, cover and let cook for 10 to 15 minutes, turning often, until the kernels are spotted brown.
Carefully remove the corn cob from the grill and transfer to a large platter.
Brush with butter and sprinkle evenly with shaker of your choice. Serve immediately.

products.name: Everything Bagel Whole Food Topper
summary: Reminiscent of a big bite of a seasoned toasted bagel.

products.name: Better Than Bacon Topper
summary: Ok, bacon lovers; we see you. We know that bacon made from ‘pinto beans’ has you feeling a kind of way: Skeptical. But trust us, this fan fave does not disappoint and it’s so easy to use. No need to grab a frying pan — just pop the top and shake on the taste of bacon with way less sodium, zero cholesterol, and no artificial flavours or colours (unlike popular brands). These crunchy bites are layered with smoky bacon flavor and are an amazing addition to salads, potatoes, eggs, and more!

products.name: Red Garlic Topper Blend
summary: A salt-free, flavorful blend of garlic, red bell pepper, onions, & herbs.
